DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Topical Cantharidin Treatment Molluscum Contagiosum
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , placebo-controlled trial . Participants recruit Pediatric Dermatology clinic Montefiore Medical Center . One hundred eligible participant randomly assign receive cantharidin 0.7 % topical , cantharidin 0.7 % topical occlusion , placebo , placebo occlusion . Treatments apply week 0 3 ( blind phase ) . At week 6 , participant treat open-label , topical cantharidin 0.7 % without occlusion every 3 week lesion resolve ( open-label phase ) .
